name: MSCRMImportSolutionsUsingConfig
description: Imports PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 Solutions using a json configuration
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: ConfigFilePath
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the file on the agent server containing the import config json. Example config [here](https://github.com/WaelHamze/xrm-ci-framework/blob/master/MSDYNV9/Xrm.Framework.CI/Xrm.Framework.CI.Common/Schema/ImportSolutionsExample.json).

inputs.name: logsDirectory
inputs.label: Logs Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the directory on agent server where logs will be placed. By default this will be $env:System_DefaultWorkingDirectory
